## About Me

Hi, I'm Haitie Liu! I'm a data science student with a passion for using data to solve real-world problems.

### Education

- University of Washington, Bachelor's in Business Administration, 2018
- Southern Methodist University, Masters in Data Science, 2024

### Related Experience

- Graduate Study Researcher & Teaching Assistant, Analyst, 1 year



### Skills

- Programming: Python, R, SQL
- Machine Learning: Regression, Classification, Clustering, Natural Language Processing
- Data Visualization: ggplot2, Tableau, R Shiny
- Tools: Git, Jupyter Notebook, Visual Studio Code

### Interests

- Data Visualization: I enjoy creating engaging and informative visualizations that effectively communicate insights from data.
- Natural Language Processing: I am interested in applying NLP techniques to analyze unstructured data, such as text data from social media or customer feedback.



Thanks for taking the time to read my About Me page! Feel free to connect with me on [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/haitie-liu-a3b9ab122/) or [GitHub](https://github.com/haitieliu) to learn more about my work.
